Html:
Where is the documentation for the Editor?

I want to know the names of all of the buttons I can add to the toolbar in my custom editor without having to guess the names.

(You can find it in the source code - but this is not the point, having a page for documentation is very easy and typical for a library like this...)

I agree with TigerWolf.

Heck, I'd write the documentation for you if you made a publicly editable "Documentation" wiki page. It's really just a matter of reformatting the content of the vsdoc file.
